channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- PowerPoint Viewer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- PowerPoint Viewer

item.title: CVE-2018-8501|2024-08-05T06:54:36.827Z -- microsoft -- powerpoint%20viewer
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft PowerPoint software when the software fails to properly handle objects in Protected View, aka "Microsoft PowerPoint Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Office 365 ProPlus, PowerPoint Viewer, Microsoft Office, Microsoft PowerPoint.
